reviews.sentence: Convenient Location for St Josephs Hospital Activities. This was the second time my husband and I have stayed at this hotel. We needed a good base of operations for consult with a cardiologist at St Josephs Hospital and this location was perfect. There was no need to get back in traffic on I285 to reach the hospital which was maybe 15 miles away. The room was comfortable and clean. Great water pressure in the shower. Loved the cooked to order breakfast. Harold made sure we had everything we needed from the breakfast buffet. he is a very pleasant fellow. There were cookies in the lobby in the afternoon evening but we did not get a chance to try them. I will stay at this property again in 3 weeks when we return for husbands surgery.

Best Stay in Atlanta. Best services and people to stay with when you are not home. This location was the best as far as shopping Malls Movies Eating relaxing and just doing nothing. The staff at this location was the Best and any and everything we needed and wanted they were able to help and supply. The Bar was GREAT. Jerry did a great job making us feel like we were at home.

Picked for Convenience but Business Park Location Had One Way Streets That Complicated Travel. The facility was well kept and although we could not take advantage of the dining facilities due to other arrangements we were pleased with how they looked and the menu selections. Overall a nice place. Location was in business park with one way streets so you could not leave and return the same way. This made simple excursions a bit more complicated than they really should have been.

Great service staff location. My stay was 7 nights. I did not rent a car but used the hotel shuttle which took me anywhere within a 3 mile radius. All drivers were prompt friendly and professional. My wait times for the shuttle were very reasonable. I ate in the restaurant a couple of times and found the food to be good and very reasonably priced. I did have some trouble with my television and called the front desk. Literally within 10 minutes my television was replaced with a new larger set. The front desk staff was very helpful with restaurant and shopping suggestions and even gave me a free beverage one morning when I slept in and missed getting a newspaper. I will definitely stay here next time I am in town. Location cost staff free shuttle within 3 miles restaurant outside sitting areas Close to shopping restaurants movies. Shuttle will take you to the MARTA station where you can take train downtown to events attractions. My bathroom sink was slow to drain but I forgot to tell the front desk.
Great visit. I very much enjoyed my hotel stay the hotel was located near great shopping and restaurants. I would definitely recommend this hotel to others.

Amazing Hospitality worth every penny spent. I simply loved the hospitality of the staff here. They are all so nice and well behaved. The location of the hotel is amazing. Rooms are spacious and comfortable breakfast is served hot and tasty. it is highly recommended if you are visiting Atlanta. However with this kind of hotel the fitness center they have is very small and disappointing. A lot can be improved in that front. Overall it was worth the money i spent at thi hotel.
Excellent place and service. I love the fact that you do not have to leave the hotel to get proper food. The bar has a great selection and the staff is friendly and attentive.

Almost perfect stay. Our stay was almost flawless but we had a couple of hiccups that marred our stay a bit. Hotel itself is very nice looks like it is pretty updated and well kept. The front desk staff was very nice and hospitable. We got in on a late flight so we were very happy with how quick and easy check in was. When we got to the room we were fairly pleased. Room looked clean no weird smells or anything. Though not too long after getting to the room we experienced a couple of inconveniences. We wanted to order room service but after attempting to call 6 times and the phone ringing with no one picking up my husband ended up having to leave our room and head downstairs to put in our orders. Then when he got down there they informed us that only the appetizers and sandwiches are available to order within the last hour of service. Ok not a big deal. So my husband gets back up to our room and we decide that while we wait we will watch some tv. Aand the tv did not work. So we go to call about the tv and we no get no answer once more. Not a great start to our stay. Everything else was fine though. On the plus side one of the mornings we had breakfast at the buffet and the service was so AMAZING. The food was great the servers and host were very attentive to our needs and were constantly checking in on us.

Hilton Garden Inn PDK Georgia. Great Place to stay. Keeps the brand message throughout the hotel. Breakfast is great bedding is comfortable and always a big welcome when you arrive. it is like coming home. This particular hotel is close to a great deal of shopping. I have stayed here multiple times for business and have never been disappointed in the hotel or the staff.

The hotel was fine. You get what you expect from a typical HGI. Staff was very nice room was clean quiet and adequate. TV channels were responsive. The restaurant had a good menu. We liked the pasta primavera and garden burger options. The chef made scrambled eggs during dinner time for our kid which was very nice. The pool and hot tub were both okay but not the cleanest. There was assorted debris and hair in the water on the second evening we went there. So we could not use them.

Great hotel in a nice location. There is a lot to do in the area. I ’m good hilton honors so breakfast was free go for the omelette it ’s fresh and made to order. The coffee was fresh and hot. Our room was cozy looks renovated shower head and water pressure was awesome. The pics are views of lobby kitchen bar area and down the steps are the meeting rooms.

Great experience good staff team. The place is nice the people are great. Breakfast first day left a bit to be desired because it was very busy so attention of staff was beyond slow. The next day there was not a crowd and experience greatly improved.

Exceptional. The hot breakfast was not ready until 7 am. I think this is late. There were cold breakfast options available but they did not even have the lights in the breakfast space on before 7. We were done eating and waiting for our car at the valet stand when they turned the lights on.

Disappointing. We stayed here for a weekend recently for a college reunion get together. First problem started at check in. We checked in unloaded luggage while I waited in lobby my husband went to park car. Came back with a ticket for pay parking. Told the desk clerk who did not check us in we were guests why were we charged. He then went to explain since we were there visiting or for a meeting even though he said we were registered. Finally the clerk who checked us in was free gave us a parking permit. I asked why that was not given when we checked in said he did not know we were parking. You have to park in garage in most cases there is some Disabled Parking near hotel a few Diamond members parking we are diamond but none available. They did reimburse him for the parking charge. We were given a room on the top floor but it was an adjoining room one of my preferences is not to have that. One strange thing was the doors. The door into room obviously opened in but the closet door opened out so did the bathroom which was unusual so you have 3 doors opening into each other can hit someone. The safety bar in shower was not put in correct location unles you were going to straddle the toilet to get in out no way you can hold onto it while in shower. Apparently one of the 2 elevators was broken but no sign was ever put on door to let people know. So always a wait full elevators since hotel was full. The housekeeping staff also had to use that one elevator with their carts laundry so with that people luggage carts long waits. The breakfast was good but can not compliment much else about the place.
Patient is excellent contemporary awesome staff in service. Although you have to buy breakfast for 1295 it is worth the price. The rooms are very clean and presentable and well updated.

One of the worst stays in years. Shuttle service advertised but poorly managed room not properly cleaned prior guest soap bar in bathtub etc front desk staff poorly trained arrogant and uncaring no management oversite and presence to resolve guest concerns. While i like the brand would never stay at this particular location again.

Just Unbelievable. Let ’s start with the death hill from where the parking lot is located it would be GREAT if you ’re informed about this at check in. Rooms are subpar clean at least. Bathroom was a little sketchy I hate towel racks above the tub. How does anything ever dry. First morning at breakfast figured we order and take it back to our room. I ordered a simple omelette as my wife but she got pancakes also. We waited over 45 minutes and THREE ATTEMPTS got 2 other folks ’ omelette twice then no omelettes but got French toast before our food was finally ready. My waffle and our coffees were ice cold and our granola with yogurt was soggy as heck by this point. Not to mention how unkept the bar and tables are at 9 am. 2 poor women scrambling all over that lobby trying to feed hundreds of folks. Now we ’ve been waiting almost 2 weeks for the 50 “ incidental fee ” we were told was required upon check out we were told 24 hours. after a week we were told 5 7 business days and as of today it ’s “ 14 days generally ”. Oh the staffs ’ level of professionalism empathy and SERVICE should be in the Hall of Fame. I either have extremely high standards in terms of customer service because of what I do or. nah it was really that MESSED up. The reviews are what helped us decide to go with this location this world must really be full of subpar standards huh. No need to worry about the two of us returning or ever recommending this monstrosity of a business to anyone we may be remotely acquainted to. Trust.
The property was really nice. did not like that they did not have continental breakfast.

Nightmare. The water in the shower was good and hot. My bed was made to perfection. But when i pulled the back there was tiny hairs all over the bed. There was construction in the lobby sul if i wanted to relax in the lobby i could not because there was no space. There was no real bar and the restaurant was subpar and far too expensive. There was 2 elevators but only one worked and i found myself waiting sometimes 10 minutes for it to come. The pool was in a small enclosed area. The parking lot was a 5 min walk away up a hill and secluded. did not feel safe going out or coming in at night.

Pretty good for a last minute reservation. The room was nice and spacious. The beds were super comfortable. The breakfast did n’t meet my expectations. Wish it came included with the reservation. The lighting in the rooms were n’t that great. The brightest light was in the bathroom.
